solutions.name: Getting Started
solutions.description: Configure your development environment to be productive with IBM Cloud.

solutions.name: Scalable web app on Kubernetes
solutions.description: Run a web application locally in a container, build a container image and push the image to a private registry and then deploy it to a Kubernetes cluster

solutions.name: Move a VM based application to Kubernetes
solutions.description: Take a VM based application, containerize it, deploy it to a Kubernetes cluster. Use the steps as a general guides for other applications.

solutions.name: Continuous Deployment to Kubernetes
solutions.description: Set up a continuous integration and delivery pipeline for containerized applications running on a Kubernetes cluster. Add integrations to other services like security scanners, Slack notifications, and analytics.

solutions.name: Scalable web app on OpenShift
solutions.description: Scaffold a nodejs web application, run it locally in a container and then deploy it to an OpenShift cluster. Additionally, bind a custom domain, monitor the health of the environment and scale.

solutions.name: Service Mesh on OpenShift
solutions.description: Install Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh alongside microservices for a sample app called BookInfo in a Red Hat OpenShift on IBM Cloud cluster.

solutions.name: Deploy microservices with OpenShift
solutions.description: Deploy microservices to an OpenShift cluster, view their logs and metrics, use an operator to provision IBM Cloud services.

solutions.name: Accelerate delivery of static files using Object Storage and CDN
solutions.description: Host and serve website assets (images, videos, documents) and user generated content in a Cloud Object Storage and use a Content Delivery Network (CDN) for fast and secure delivery to users around the world.

solutions.name: Accelerate a dynamic website using Dynamic Content Acceleration
solutions.description: Use Dynamic Content Acceleration to reduce latency for dynamic and uncacheable contents of your web application.

solutions.name: Plan, create and update deployment environments
solutions.description: Automate the creation and maintenance of multiple deployment environments with IBM Cloud CLI and Terraform.

solutions.name: Modern web application using MEAN stack
solutions.description: Build a web application using the popular MEAN stack - Mongo DB, Express, Angular, Node.js. Run the app locally, create and use a database-as-a-service, deploy the app and monitor the application.

solutions.name: SQL Database for Cloud Data
solutions.description: Provision a SQL relational database service, create a table, and load a large data set into the database. Deploy a web app to make use of that data and show how to access the cloud database.

solutions.name: Serverless web application and API with Code Engine
solutions.description: Create a serverless web application by hosting static website content in Cloud Object Storage and using Code Engine and Cloudant to implement the application backend.

solutions.name: Analyze logs and monitor application health with LogDNA and Sysdig
solutions.description: Use IBM Log Analysis to understand and diagnose application activities. Monitor applications with IBM Cloud Monitoring.

solutions.name: Text Analysis with Code Engine
solutions.description: Create a Code Engine project and deploy a text analysis application.

solutions.name: Build a database-driven Slackbot
solutions.description: Build a database-driven Slackbot with IBM Watson Assistant, Db2 and Code Engine.

solutions.name: Resilient and secure multi-region Kubernetes clusters
solutions.description: Integrate Cloud Internet Services with Kubernetes clusters to deliver a resilient and secure solution across multiple regions.

solutions.name: Apply end to end security to a cloud application
solutions.description: Create a secure cloud application that features data encrypted with your own keys, user authentication, and security auditing.

solutions.name: Enhance security of your deployed application
solutions.description: Enhance security of your cloud application by isolating compute, network and runtime resources.

solutions.name: Enhance cloud security by applying context-based restrictions
solutions.description: Learn how to implement context-based restrictions to enhance security of your cloud environment

solutions.name: Process big data logs with SQL
solutions.description: Collect, store and analyze log records to support regulatory requirements and aid information discovery. Using publish-subscribe messaging, scale the solution to millions of records and then perform analysis on persisted logs with familiar SQL.

solutions.name: Build a data lake with Object Storage
solutions.description: Provide tools to data scientists to query data using Data Engine (formerly SQL Query) and conduct analysis in Watson Studio. Share data and insights through interactive charts.

solutions.name: Serverless web app and eventing for data retrieval and analytics
solutions.description: Automatically collect GitHub traffic statistics for repositories, store them in a SQL database and get started with traffic analytics.

solutions.name: Build, deploy, test and monitor a predictive machine learning model
solutions.description: Build a predictive machine learning model, deploy it as an API, test and retrain the model with feedback data.

solutions.name: Best practices for organizing users, teams, applications
solutions.description: An overview of the concepts available in IBM Cloud to manage identity and access management and how they can be implemented to support the multiple development stages of an application.

solutions.name: Resource sharing across accounts
solutions.description: Benefits and implementation of sharing cloud resources across accounts.

solutions.name: Public frontend and private backend in a Virtual Private Cloud
solutions.description: Create a virtual private cloud with subnets and instances. Secure your resources by attaching security groups and only allow minimal access.

solutions.name: Deploy isolated workloads across multiple locations and zones
solutions.description: Deploy a workload in virtual private clouds across multiple zones and regions. Distribute traffic across zones with local and global load balancers.

solutions.name: Use a VPC/VPN gateway for secure and private on-premises access to cloud resources
solutions.description: Connect a Virtual Private Cloud to another computing environment over a secure Virtual Private Network and consume IBM Cloud services.

solutions.name: Install software on virtual server instances in VPC
solutions.description: Learn how to use the IBM Cloud CLI, Terraform and Ansible to install software on virtual server instances running in a Virtual Private Cloud.

solutions.name: Securely access remote instances with a bastion host
solutions.description: Deploy a bastion host to securely access remote instances within a virtual private cloud.

solutions.name: PHP web application on a LAMP Stack in VPC Gen2
solutions.description: Create an Ubuntu Linux virtual server on VPC, with Apache web server, MySQL, and PHP. Then install and configure the WordPress open source application on the LAMP stack.

solutions.name: Team based privacy using IAM, VPC, Transit Gateway and DNS
solutions.description: Connect multiple VPCs with Transit Gateway. Use DNS name resolution for microservices. Work in isolated teams with IAM

solutions.name: Scale workloads in shared and dedicated VPC environments
solutions.description: Set up isolated workloads by provisioning a VPC with subnets spanning multiple availability zones (AZs) and virtual server instances (VSIs) that can autoscale. Also, explore dedicated hosts for isolation.

solutions.name: Centralize communication through a VPC Transit Hub and Spoke architecture - Part one
solutions.description: Centralize communication through a VPC Transit Hub and Spoke architecture - Part one

solutions.name: Centralize communication through a VPC Transit Hub and Spoke architecture - Part two
solutions.description: Centralize communication through a VPC Transit Hub and Spoke architecture - Part two

solutions.name: Isolate workloads with a secure private network
solutions.description: Configure a Virtual Router Appliance to create a secure enclosure. Associate VLANs, provision servers, setup IP routing and firewalls.

solutions.name: Configure NAT for Internet access from a private network
solutions.description: Use NAT masquerade to translate private IP addresses to out-bound public interface.

solutions.name: Bring Your Own IP Address
solutions.description: An overview of BYOIP implementation patterns and a guide to identify the appropriate pattern.

solutions.name: VPN into a secure private network
solutions.description: Create a private connection between a remote network environment and servers on IBM Cloud's private network.

solutions.name: Linking secure private networks over the IBM network
solutions.description: Deploy two private networks that are securely linked over the IBM Cloud private network using the VLAN Spanning service.

solutions.name: Hosting web applications from a secure private network
solutions.description: Create a scalable and secure Internet facing web application hosted in private network secured using a virtual router appliance (VRA), VLANs, NAT and firewalls.

categories.name: VMware on VPC Bare metal servers

solutions.name: VMware
solutions.description: VMware on VPC Bare metal servers

VMware DNS

Creating a virtual data center in a VMware as a Service with Terraform
solutions.description: Learn how to operationalize a VMware as a Service – single tenant instance after initial instance provisioning using Terraform.

solutions.name: Creating a virtual data center in a VMware as a Service using the UI
solutions.description: Learn how to operationalize a VMware as a Service – single tenant instance after initial instance provisioning using the UI.

solutions.name: Getting Started with IBM Cloud for VMware Shared
solutions.description: Create a network for Internet and IBM Cloud private access inside of a VMware virtual data center and deploy a virtual machine.
